cards.desc:
**Format**
Daily Post: IG Feed + Story (JPEG) - Carousel (max 10 images)
Announcement

_____

**Brief**

Berikut foto2 yg bisa dipake, bbrp alternatif ya utk di coba dengan lay out alternatif:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cns_BzbdJYkMhwrgQg91K5ZilJYHFgZN/view?usp=sharing

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P5YNfJmeLhoG0qYmJHXwfn8--tbj3PfR/view?usp=sharing

https://drive.google.com/file/d/14UgNXn2S8rDzUBq71JQTjmHSiicpT9ZE/view?usp=sharing

_____


**Copywriting**

PAGE 1

[ main title ] FREE MEALS 
[ pre title ] for friends in need. 

[ small text ] As part of our on-going "Dapur Ruben & Friends" program, we are giving out free meals (bold) to those directly impacted by the pandemic or simply anyone in need. This initiative is just a small act of kindness that we chose to pass on regularly. 

[ small text ] Swipe to read how you can participate!

PAGE 2.

NOMINATE SOMEONE

It can be a friend/neighbor/family members/ relatives/colleague/etc that is impacted by the pandemic and is currently going through a hard time. 

Who is eligible for FREE MEALS?
Covid patients, family members of covid patients, medical professionals, family members of medical professionals, someone who just lost their loved ones to Covid, or simply anyone you think who would appreciate a free meal (like that single mother neighbor who is struggling to make ends meet) 

How to Nominate?
Send their details Name + Address + Contact detail
to WA (masukkin nomer HP Ciputat). Due to the limited quota, It helps to tell us a bit of the background story of the person you nominate :)

T & C:
1. These free meals will be distributed twice a week
2. We will choose 5 address/day
3. Our team will decide the time of delivery
4. Free meals include free deliveries that only cover areas up to radius 10km from each of our outlets (Gandaria & Ciputat)


PAGE 3

TRAKTIR OJOL

Did  you know? for every order of 150k that you make on Dapur Ruben through Grabfood & Gofood, you are also treating 1 FREE MEAL for your drivers. This program runs everyday so you can always participate anytime!. You have no idea how much these drivers appreciate this initiative. 

Participate now, place your 150k order through gofood & grabfood (insert logos)

cards.desc:
Slide 1
Apa itu NFT?

Slide 2
NFT (Non-Fungible Token)
Teknologi blockchain yang sifatnya seperti sertifikat digital yang menyatakan pihak mana yang menjadi pemilik dari foto, video, atau karya dalam bentuk virtual lainnya.

Slide 3
Aset-aset dengan NFT akan tercatat dan ter-enkripsi di ledger blockchain sehingga tidak dapat diduplikasi.

Slide 4
NFT menjadi jawaban atas banyaknya proses duplikasi karya digital baik itu lagu, gambar, video, memes, youtube video atau pun karya digital lainnya secara illegal.

Slide 5
Karena dia seperti sertifikat digital, maka NFT bisa diperjualbelikan.

Slide 6
Salah satu yang paling heboh dari proses jual beli NFT adalah
kicauan pertama CEO Twitter Jack Dorsey yang dijual dengan harga mencapai 2,5 juta dollar AS atau setara Rp 35 milar

Slide 7
Jangan lupa like, comment atau bagikan ke teman-teman.
Tunggu content NTMY berikutnya

**Reference**
Lihat Instagram Deka Insights & McKinsey Co 

https://instagram.com/dekainsight?igshid=183zofaelzjaw

https://instagram.com/mckinseyco?igshid=3wzl8m3khccw

**Type:**
IG Feed + Story (JPEG)

**Brief**
- Bikin social media posts yg informative, targeted untuk semua org yg mau tau lebih tentang Customer Experience in B2B Companies.
- Layout & design minta super professional, clean, consulting style, extremely premium, corporate feel.

----------

**Content**

Slide 1:

Customer Experience in B2B Companies
and why you should start paying attention to it

Slide 2:

Based on 2019’s Accenture data, 86% of B2B CMOs believe that Customer Experience is very important. 

Ironically, 

An average customer experience score of B2B companies is less than 50%, far lower than 65% - 85% for B2C companies.

Most B2B companies still underestimate the benefit of CX and they have missed a huge opportunity. 

Slide 3:

“86% of B2B buyers are willing to pay more for great customer experience.” (PWC, 2018)

“Buyers from CX leaders are 7 x more likely to return to the company when they need another product.” (Forrester, 2017)

“By the end of 2020, customer experience will beat price and product as the most important brand differentiator.”

Slide 4:

B2B marketing differs a lot from B2C marketing and one of the key differentiators is how customer relationships matter a lot for B2B marketing. Especially when 72% of B2B buyers say that negative reviews affect their purchase decision. 

Slide 5:

Don’t sleep on the benefits of customer experience! Set your budget for CX and you can be the game changer!
